description.text: Ukraine's largest online marketplace for selling and buying goods!

banner.text: We are committed to making access to all goods and services in your city as easy and convenient as possible for everyone
banner.title: We are Yom
banner.description: Our site's goal is to make online trading as accessible and simple as possible for every user. We strive to create a platform where you can easily place your ads and find the best offers for goods and services in your city. Our goal is to provide you with a convenient and efficient tool for purchases and sales so you can find everything you need and make deals with ease. Your comfort and satisfaction from using our website is our highest goal.

left.title: 3000 employees
left.text: Our team is a team of competent specialists who join forces to achieve success in all our projects and tasks.

middle.title: We are with more than 10 countries of the world
middle.text: We work in different parts of the world to bring the best solutions and services to our customers

right.title: 320 million users
right.text: Our community has over 320 million active users and is growing.

bottom.text: We are a young and ambitious team

steps.text1: Determine the size of the banner you need (e.g., 580X340 pixels). Take a closer look at the right panel of the site, where examples of our site's advertising banners are presented. Choose colors that match your brand and your website design.
steps.text2: Choose or create an image that matches your banner's message. Come up with a selling text using your branding styles. Do not post false information! Use high-quality photos for a better visual impression.
steps.text3: Place the image and text on the banner, creating a harmonious composition. Do not use more than 2 fonts. Use more space for important content that you want to be seen first.
steps.text4: Check if your banner has the correct web resolution (usually 72 dpi). Save your banner in JPG or PNG format.

description1.text1:
2.1. Announcements are to be placed in the corresponding categories and sections of the Site. It is not permitted to place an announcement in a category that does not correspond to the content and essence of the announcement.
2.2. The announcement posted on the Site must contain: The title of the Announcement, which reflects the brief content and essence of the Announcement; the information should be complete and truthful. It is prohibited to display contact information in the title of the announcement, in the product description in the Announcement, and on the photo demonstrating the product in the Announcement.
2.2.2. Description of the product (service, work), its characteristics. At the same time, details of ordering the product from the Announcement can be communicated and agreed upon between the User and the Buyer independently in a separate communication chat.
2.2.3. The price of the product/service. The price should be indicated in the national currency of Ukraine - hryvnia.
2.2.4. When posting an announcement with a product offer, the User is obliged to upload at least 1 (one) real photo with images of this product. Photos demonstrating the product or service offered by the User for sale must correspond to the title and text of the Announcement. The announcement must contain real photos of the subject of the Announcement, corresponding to the specific unit of the product being sold.
2.2.5. Reliable information about the User - the author of the Announcement, including contact information (name, address, e-mail, telephone). Contact data are specified in the form of submitting an announcement in a special field, they are not displayed in the Announcement (except for the telephone number and name/title), but are used for communication with the User through a special contact form.

add_an_advertisement.title: Start creating an ad
add_an_advertisement.input_placeholder1: Come up with a short title for potential buyers

blocks.text_block1: Enter key phrases, such as the brand, model, or other information about the product (Nike, Apple, Asus) in the search field above
blocks.text_block2: The search field will help avoid mistakes when entering the name of your product or brand
blocks.text_block3: After completely filling out the ad, apply a preview, and then post your item

add_an_advertisement.text2: How to take a photo of the product?
add_an_advertisement.description: Take up to 20 simple photos on your phone from different angles in a normal setting. For buyers, the beauty of the photo is less important than the real condition of the items.
add_an_advertisement.input_placeholder2: Come up with a detailed description of your product
add_an_advertisement.description1: Describe the product in detail. Be honest and precise. Highlight the features and benefits of the product. Indicate the reason for sale, how and how much it was used.
add_an_advertisement.description3: Has been unpacked or has any signs of use
add_an_advertisement.description5: Checked and refurbished item with a one-week warranty from the seller
add_an_advertisement.description6: The item is refurbished or restored. It has signs of use
add_an_advertisement.description4: Start typing the name of the city and select it from the list. The chosen location will be displayed in this ad.
